section.title: Adding a VMware vCenter Provider
section.para: After initial installation and creation of a CloudForms Management Engine environment, add a VMware vCenter provider to the appliance.

step.para:
Click
(Configuration), then click
(Add a New Infrastructure Provider).
Enter the Name of the provider to add. The Name is how the device is labeled in the console.
Select VMware vCenter from the Type list.
Enter the Host Name (or IPv4 or IPv6 address) of the provider.

important.para: The Host Name must use a unique fully qualified domain name.

step.para: Select the appropriate Zone for the provider. By default, the zone is set to default.
In the Credentials area, under Default, provide the login credentials required for the VMware vCenter administrative user:

listitem.para: Enter the user name in the User ID field.
Enter the user password in the Password field.
Confirm the user password in the Verify Password field.
Click Validate to confirm that the CloudForms Management Engine can connect to the VMware vCenter using the user name and password.
